about:
Hello! 

 I am Casmiro Granado, and I've been in love with programming for 10 years now. I am currently a Full-Stack Developer and had three internships previously along with a Bachelors of Computer Science and minor of Mathematics at Texas Tech University. I love Software Development because I love the problems I get to solve. Also, importantly, I love the people I get to meet and collaborate with. I am a continuous learner who loves to take on new and exciting challenges! I know my dedication and drive for Software Development means I can tackle any problem.
